<rule id="springboot-di-to-quarkus-00001" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <xmlfile matches="//*/b:bean/@class">
                             <namespace prefix="b" uri="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"/>
                    </xmlfile>
                    <xmlfile matches="//*/c:annotation-config">
                                <namespace prefix="c" uri="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"/>
                    </xmlfile>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="For Spring DI the XML-based bean configuration metadata is not supported by Quarkus ">
                    <message>Quarkus only supports the java-based configuration of Spring beans.</message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/spring-di" title="Quarkus Extension for Spring DI API- Guide "/>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/spring-di#important-technical-note" title="Quarkus Extension for Spring DI API - Technical Limitations"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
